original_text: And I went up by revelation, and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles, but privately to them which were of reputation, lest by any means I should run, or had run, in vain.
korean_text: 계시를 따라 올라가 내가 이방 가운데서 전파하는 복음을 그들에게 제시하되 유력한 자들에게 사사로이 한 것은 내가 달음질하는 것이나 달음질한 것이 헛되지 않게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: And I went up by revelation
and communicated unto them that gospel
which I preach among the Gentiles
but privately to them which were of reputation
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 명망 있는 자들에게는 사적으로 전했다

sentences.original_text: lest by any means I should run, or had run, in vain
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 경우에든 내가 헛되이 달릴까 하여서이다
